sentences: Mis siin enam vaielda, asi on otsustatud ja aamen!
Sest sinu päralt on riik, vägi ja au igavesti. Aamen.
context: "lõpetas" is the past tense third person singular form of the Estonian verb "lõpetama," which means "to finish" or "to conclude." In this context, it's used to indicate that someone (like a teacher) finished their prayer or statement with the word "amen." It shows completion and finality in religious contexts.
